inclusion.criterion: admitted to Medical or Surgical ICU
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: admission blood glucose < 500 mg/dL without laboratory evidence of DKA
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: acute hyperglycemic crises such as diabetic ketoacidosis (DKA) and hyperosmolar hyperglycemic state
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has had type 1 diabetes for 11 years, but is currently homeless and has lost his insulin supply. He reports previous episodes of diabetic ketoacidosis.
